titles.title: Let the redeemed of the Lord say so

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Let the redeemed of the Lord say so
Let the redeemed of the Lord say so
Let the redeemed of the Lord say so

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I'm redeemed
I'm redeemed
Praise the Lord

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I cried unto the Lord with my voice
I cried unto the Lord with my voice
I cried unto the Lord with my voice
and he heard me out of His holy hill

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
My Glory and the lifter of my head
My Glory and the lifter of my head

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
For thou oh Lord my God are a shield to me
My Glory and the lifter of my head
